postInstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DCOS Service is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/spark-1-7/

postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/spark-1-7/#scrollNav-6 to clean up any persisted state.
